name: Claude
description: The $MCP token is the first token launched on Solana by the new MCP protocol, or Model Context Protocol by Anthropic. It was launched live on stream on X, through the Claude Desktop app, making it the first token to ever be launched with Claude. The project seeks to not only pay homage to MCP in the real world, but by using $MCP to power web 3 MCP servers, clients, and infrastructure. In order to use the $MCP terminal, users must verify their holdings in terminal, with our very own custom verification system. Once verified users may have access to our agentic swarm led by the world's very first, "MCP agent," powered by $MCP token on solana.
